PROD-001.name: Merino Wool Performance Jacket
PROD-001.description: Italian merino wool jacket with tailored fit and breathable fabric. Features premium YKK zippers and water-resistant finish. Perfect for urban professionals and outdoor enthusiasts.

PROD-002.name: Technical Cashmere Sweater
PROD-002.description: Luxury cashmere blend sweater with enhanced durability. Temperature-regulating fabric maintains comfort in all seasons. Modern slim fit with reinforced elbows.

PROD-003.name: Heritage Leather Weekender Bag
PROD-003.description: Full-grain Italian leather weekender with brass hardware. Hand-stitched construction and canvas lining. Develops unique patina over time. Limited edition colorway.

PROD-004.name: Performance Stretch Trousers
PROD-004.description: Japanese technical fabric trousers with four-way stretch and wrinkle resistance. Water-repellent finish with hidden zip pockets. Perfect for travel and active lifestyle.

PROD-005.name: Lightweight Down Vest
PROD-005.description: Premium 800-fill goose down vest with ultra-lightweight construction. Packable design fits into its own pocket. Ideal for layering or travel.

PROD-006.name: Swiss Automatic Watch
PROD-006.description: Swiss-made automatic timepiece with sapphire crystal and exhibition caseback. 42mm stainless steel case with Italian leather strap. 100m water resistance.

PROD-007.name: Merino Wool Base Layer Set
PROD-007.description: Premium merino wool base layer system. Moisture-wicking and odor-resistant. Flatlock seams prevent chafing. Essential for all-season performance.

PROD-008.name: Premium Leather Chelsea Boots
PROD-008.description: Handcrafted Italian leather Chelsea boots with Goodyear welt construction. Blake-stitched leather sole and cushioned insole. Modern silhouette with elastic side panels.
